title: Kirill Girnyk
text:
Kirill Ivanovich Girnyk (; born 31 March 2003) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Rostov">FC Rostov</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> for <a href="FC%20Rostov">FC Rostov</a> on 19 June 2020 in a game against <a href="PFC%20Sochi">PFC Sochi</a>. FC Rostov was forced to field their Under-18 squad in that game as their main squad was quarantined after 6 players tested positive for <a href="COVID-19">COVID-19</a>.
